Package ohos.accessibility

Provides a collection of classes for interacting with the accessibility system service and provides interfaces for sending accessibility events, querying the accessibility service status, and sending accessibility status change events.

The AccessibilitySystemAbilityClient class is used to create an accessibility system client that interacts with the accessibility system service. You can use the client to send accessibility events specified by AccessibilityEventInfo to the accessibility ability for processing.

The AccessibilityStateObserver class is used to create an observer. You can register the observer using AccessibilitySystemAbilityClient. When the accessibility status changes, the observer will receive a status event specified by AccessibilityStateEvent.

The AccessibilityAbilityInfo class describes the basic information about the accessibility abilities. You can call this class to query information about the accessibility ability.

Since:
1
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AccessibilityStateObserver
    Observes the accessibility status.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AccessibilityAbilityInfo
    Queries information about an accessibility ability.
    AccessibilityEventInfo
    Describes the accessibility event information and provides the information for the accessibility service.
    AccessibilityStateEvent
    Provides accessibility status events.
    AccessibilitySystemAbilityClient
    Provides a client for interacting with the accessibility ability.
    CaptionProperties
    Configures the visual properties of video captions, including the text size, language, foreground color, background color, border properties, and font.
